tool.help:
Tool for annotating STAR-Fusion results --------------------------------------- Takes abridged star_fusion results and runs the donor (left gene) and acceptor (right gene) of the fusion breakpoint as MAFlite files into Oncotator (as single nt deletions), and gDNA sequence up (donor) and down (acceptor) from the fusion gene-to-gene breakpoint.
# Input Input should be the final, abridged, FFPM from STAR-Fusion. Should be called star-fusion.fusion_candidates.final.abridged.FFPM.
# Output * left_brkpnt.maf : MAF-lite files for donor (left gene) fusion breakpoint * right_brkpnt.maf : MAF-lite files for acceptor (right gene) fusion breakpoint * oncotated_left : entire Oncotator output from left gene breakpoint * right_output : entire Oncotator output from right gene breakpoint * left_sequence.txt : sequence of breakpoint up-strand of the left gene breakpoint * right_sequence.txt : sequence of breakpoint down-strand of right gene breakpoint
